title: AMERIKIN
description: A play by Chisa Hutchinson directed by Jade King Carroll, exploring themes of identity and division in small-town Maryland. The story follows Jeff Browning as he navigates his newborn son's future amidst surprising ancestry test results and the complexities of belonging.
address: 59E59 Theaters, a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
cost: $26 (with code SKINT, incl. $6 fee â€“ reg. $66-86)
